img_summary: The image depicts a golden figurine resembling a small, seated character holding a spherical object. Based on the context, it is likely an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*. Positioned between descriptions of other items, it is part of a collection of artifacts or equipment that provide specific gameplay benefits. The figurine's ornate design suggests it may have a unique or rare status, potentially enhancing the player's abilities or stats in the game.
